Chordate:



Chordate sighed in a dreamy tone, Feline now moving her lovely tail over 
parts of his head.  It felt wonderful!  
"Oh...a-a drink.  Yeah.  Water?  Ok." he said, pressing a few buttons at a 
dispencer with his free arm, two cups appearing.

One of the cups had cold water in it, the other had a pink liquid, liquid 
energon.  Since the attack in space, and then the crash, Chordate hadn't had 
much time to sit around and do nothing.  But with the kitty holding onto him 
so lovingly, now was a good time for him!

Grabbing the cup of water, he held it in front of Feline, a shiver running 
through him as he began to feel the vibrations of her lovely purr, her head 
rubbing against his shoulder.
